name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifiers associated with this Medication Dispense that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by the performer or other systems and remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Identifiers associated with this Medication Dispense that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by the performer or other systems and remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifiers associated with this Medication Dispense that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by the pe

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this MedicationDispense.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this MedicationDispense.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this MedicationDispense.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: The procedure that trigger the dispense.

name: $addpartOf
desc: The procedure that trigger the dispense.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The procedure that trigger the dispense.

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code specifying the state of the set of dispense events.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code specifying the state of the set of dispense events.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Indicates the type of medication dispense (for example, where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered (i.e. inpatient or outpatient)).

name: $addcategory
desc: Indicates the type of medication dispense (for example, where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered (i.e. inpatient or outpatient)).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates the type of medication dispense (for example, where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered (i.e. inpatient or outpatient)).

name: $subject
desc: Returns: A link to a resource representing the person or the group to whom the medication will be given.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing the person or the group to whom the medication will be given.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: The encounter that establishes the context for this event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The encounter that establishes the context for this event.

name: $supportingInformation
desc: Returns: Additional information that supports the medication being dispensed.

name: $addsupportingInformation
desc: Additional information that supports the medication being dispensed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information that supports the medication being dispensed.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: Indicates who or what performed the event.

name: $addperformer
desc: Indicates who or what performed the event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates who or what performed the event.

name: $location
desc: Returns: The principal physical location where the dispense was performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The principal physical location where the dispense was performed.

name: $authorizingPrescription
desc: Returns: Indicates the medication order that is being dispensed against.

name: $addauthorizingPrescription
desc: Indicates the medication order that is being dispensed against.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates the medication order that is being dispensed against.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Indicates the type of dispensing event that is performed. For example, Trial Fill, Completion of Trial, Partial Fill, Emergency Fill, Samples, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the type of dispensing event that is performed. For example, Trial Fill, Completion of Trial, Partial Fill, Emergency Fill, Samples, etc.

name: $quantity
desc: Returns: The amount of medication that has been dispensed. Includes unit of measure.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The amount of medication that has been dispensed. Includes unit of measure.

name: $daysSupply
desc: Returns: The amount of medication expressed as a timing amount.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The amount of medication expressed as a timing amount.

name: $whenPrepared
desc: Returns: The time when the dispensed product was packaged and reviewed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The time when the dispensed product was packaged and reviewed.

name: $whenHandedOver
desc: Returns: The time the dispensed product was provided to the patient or their representative.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The time the dispensed product was provided to the patient or their representative.

name: $destination
desc: Returns: Identification of the facility/location where the medication was shipped to, as part of the dispense event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identification of the facility/location where the medication was shipped to, as part of the dispense event.

name: $receiver
desc: Returns: Identifies the person who picked up the medication or the location of where the medication was delivered.  This will usually be a patient or their caregiver, but some cases exist where it can be a healthcare professional or a location.

name: $addreceiver
desc: Identifies the person who picked up the medication or the location of where the medication was delivered.  This will usually be a patient or their caregiver, but some cases exist where it can be a healthcare professional or a location.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the person who picked up the medication or the location of where the medication was delivered.  This will usually be a patient or their caregiver, but some cases exist where it can be a healthcare professional or a location.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Extra information about the dispense that could not be conveyed in the other attributes.

name: $addnote
desc: Extra information about the dispense that could not be conveyed in the other attributes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Extra information about the dispense that could not be conveyed in the other attributes.

name: $dosageInstruction
desc: Returns: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

name: $adddosageInstruction
desc: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

name: $substitution
desc: Returns: Indicates whether or not substitution was made as part of the dispense.  In some cases, substitution will be expected but does not happen, in other cases substitution is not expected but does happen.  This block explains what substitution did or did not happen and why.  If nothing is specified, substitution was not done.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether or not substitution was made as part of the dispense.  In some cases, substitution will be expected but does not happen, in other cases substitution is not expected but does happen.  This block explains what substitution did or did not h

name: $detectedIssue
desc: Returns: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

name: $adddetectedIssue
desc: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

name: $eventHistory
desc: Returns: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the dispense was verified.

name: $addeventHistory
desc: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the dispense was verified.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the dispense was verified.
